D236179A7AFB478EB6E30687C16DD7CF.description: Support interpretations of the expressive intent and meaning of musical works citing as evidence the treatment of the elements of music, contexts, (when appropriate) the setting of the text, and varied researched sources

1D9E6824F2864933B3D2E2A44A4D49B3.description: Demonstrate mastery of the technical demands and an understanding of expressive qualities of the music in prepared and improvised performances of a varied repertoire representing diverse cultures, styles, genres, and historical periods

8CB185A7CB064E5FAB5DDADEB884FE77.description: Compose and improvise ideas for arrangements, sections, and short compositions for specific purposes that reflect characteristic(s) of music from a variety of cultures studied in rehearsal.

C94098A6B529435E890F3F35F8A00E35.description: Apply criteria to select music for specified purposes, supporting choices by citing characteristics found in the music and connections to interest, purpose, and context.

5725E314C5A94E179D86E391690000C8.description: Explain the criteria used to select a varied repertoire to study based on an understanding of theoretical and structural characteristics of the music, the technical skill of the individual or ensemble, and the purpose or context of the performance.

2BB62B9835FD4455BF11F502ED2BE35A.description: Compose and improvise ideas for melodies, rhythmic passages, and arrangements for specific purposes that reflect characteristic(s) of music from a variety of historical periods studied in rehearsal.

F50FB7F2B5C14A83BD4C92E84A02DAFE.description: Identify and support interpretations of the expressive intent and meaning of musical works, citing as evidence the treatment of the elements of music, contexts, and (when appropriate) the setting of the text.

71C1A95F131C4E8DAAA0F5F5D0AF44D4.description: Select a varied repertoire to study based on music reading skills (where appropriate), an understanding of formal design in the music, context, and the technical skill of the individual and ensemble.

2BE603753ECA43548455DB0DFAAA4DED.description: Compose and improvise ideas for melodies and rhythmic passages based on characteristic(s) of music or text(s) studied in rehearsal.

29FE0F3F07BB4E65BE353DEFEF1F2A96.description: Identify and describe the effect of interest, experience, analysis, and context on the evaluation of music.

22D986CF7C3141EC9886058302B625EB.description:
Identify interpretations of the expressive intent and meaning of musical works, referring to the elements of
music, contexts, and (when appropriate) the setting of the text.

A37A9CA59829480686D4405E6CA24301.description:
Identify how knowledge of context and the use of repetition, similarities, and contrasts inform the response to
music.

01B9DE4824FF4C22A04E749D0D9B7369.description:
Identify reasons for selecting music based on characteristics found in the music, connection to interest, and
purpose or context.

D23133CC33B244BD85E3C5259251CE4C.description:
Share personally-developed melodic and rhythmic ideas or motives – individually or as an ensemble – that
demonstrate understanding of characteristics of music or texts studied in rehearsal.

13BC85394BF14F1B9A9105CF87FAC359.description:
Evaluate and refine draft compositions and improvisations based on knowledge, skill, and teacherprovided
criteria.

4F6744CC831F406082D7527F9861E73B.description:
Select and develop draft melodic and rhythmic ideas or motives that demonstrate understanding of
characteristic(s) of music or text(s) studied in rehearsal.

3DC92E2307F942C8A385498B15F29006.description:
Compose and improvise melodic and rhythmic ideas or motives that reflect characteristic(s) of music or
text(s) studied in rehearsal.

987FE8BAFC084CD896B7935057979A0C.description:
Select varied repertoire to study based on interest, music reading skills (where appropriate), an understanding
of the structure of the music, context, and the technical skill of the individual or ensemble.

78FEE23192394A63AE4CE5BE9859A9BF.description:
Demonstrate attention to technical accuracy and expressive qualities in prepared and improvised
performances of a varied repertoire of music.

5CE2F55CE4B84413B4952BFBA0DADCB3.description:
Use self-reflection and peer feedback to refine individual and ensemble performances of a varied repertoire
of music.

35B63AD6B80B482381B5807F45EEE5D2.description:
Identify expressive qualities in a varied repertoire of music that can be demonstrated through prepared and
improvised performances.

AB85DED0A244419D99918461B8081A2A.description:
Demonstrate, using music reading skills where appropriate, how knowledge of formal aspects in musical works
inform prepared or improvised performances.
